13namespace xdsp::waveshaper {
14
30inline double tanh2_fast(const double x) {
31 const double x_abs = fabs(x);
32 const double x2 = x * x;
33
34 const double a0 = 2.45550750702956;
35 const double a1 = 0.893229853513558;
36 const double a2 = 0.821226666969744;
37 const double a3 = 2.44506634652299;
38 const double a4 = 0.814642734961073;
39
40 const double p0 = (a0 + a0 * x_abs + (a1 + a2 * x_abs) * x2);
41 const double p1 = (a3 + (a3 + x2) * fabs(x + a4 * x * x_abs));
42
43 return (x * p0 / p1);
44}
45
54double atan_sat(double x, double sat) { return atan(x * sat) / atan(sat); }
55
64double tanh_sat(double x, double sat) { return tanh(x * sat) / tanh(sat); }
65
74double exponential(double x, double sat) {
75 return util::sgn(x) * (1.0 - exp(-1.0 * fabs(sat * x)));
76}
77
85double sinusoidal(double x) {
86 if (fabs(x) > (2.0 / 3.0)) {
87 return util::sgn(x);
88 } else {
89 return sin(3.0 * consts::PI * x / 4.0);
90 }
91}
92
101double exponential2(double x, double p) {
102 if (fabs(x) > (2.0 / 3.0)) {
103 return util::sgn(x);
104 } else {
105 return util::sgn(x) * (1.0 - pow(fabs(1.5 * x - util::sgn(x)), p));
106 }
107}
108
116double two_stage_quad(double x) {
117 const double lower = 1.0 / 3.0;
118 const double upper = 2.0 / 3.0;
119 const double x_abs = fabs(x);
120
121 if (x_abs > upper) {
122 return util::sgn(x);
123 } else if ((lower <= x_abs) && (x_abs <= upper)) {
124 return util::sgn(x) * (3.0 - pow(2.0 - fabs(3.0 * x), 2.0)) / 3.0;
125 } else {
126 return 2.0 * x;
127 }
128}
129
130} // namespace xdsp::waveshaper
